parallel programming techniques like OpenMP OpenMPI and Cuda.
Parallel programming techniques like OpenMP, OpenMPI and Cuda
Parallel programming, cuda, SMP.
Parallel programming with OpenMP, MPI, and CUDA. Algorithms to optimize for parallel programming.
I learnt skills such as programming for parallel problems and gpu programming. Very naaice
Ability to parallel programming
Parallel programming
I've learned the concepts of cache hierarchy, the factors that influence the efficiency, and the three main parallel programming techniques: openMP, MPI, GPU.
Nice assignments!
This course covers a lot of parallel programming fields including cluster parallel and GPU parallel programming, and I learned a lot from homework.
The workload of the course is reasonable and the homework can improve our programming skills

Strength: covers broad materials
weakness: need detailed explanation of the assignments
This is a very solid class. I learned a lot. It could be improved if we received sample solution to learn how to improve our solution.
strengths of this course are that it is very engaging. lot of nice assignments. learnt a lot.
The content is kind of shallow. Not so many knowledge was covered
This course is well structured. Everything you need to know is on the lecture slides. The homework is very helpful for me to grasp both the concepts and the programming techniques.
Highly recommended!
I would recommend this course to another student, because the course can broaden our knowledge about parallel programming.
I would recommend this course to another student because the course covers a lot about parallel programming techniques and can help improve programming skills
Yes
100%. A very solid CS elective. I learned a lot from both the lectures and the problem sets; this is not always the case for all CS classes.
yes. anyone who wants to understand how parallel programs are made. this course is a must
